name: Alertes de prix Bitcoin en temps réel avec Bright Data & n8n
description:
## Description

Ce flux de travail surveille les prix du Bitcoin sur plusieurs échanges et vous envoie des alertes lorsque des baisses de prix significatives se produisent. Il aide les traders et investisseurs en crypto à identifier des opportunités d'achat sans avoir à surveiller constamment les marchés.

## Aperçu

Ce flux de travail surveille les prix du Bitcoin sur plusieurs échanges et vous envoie des alertes lorsque des baisses de prix significatives se produisent. Il utilise Bright Data pour extraire des données de prix en temps réel et peut être configuré pour vous notifier par divers canaux.

### Outils Utilisés

*   **n8n :** La plateforme d'automatisation qui orchestre le flux de travail.
*   **Bright Data :** Pour extraire des données d'échange de cryptomonnaies sans être bloqué.
*   **Services de Notification :** Email, SMS, Telegram ou autres plateformes de messagerie.

## Comment Installer

1.  **Importer le Flux de Travail :** Téléchargez le fichier `.json` et importez-le dans votre instance n8n.
2.  **Configurer Bright Data :** Ajoutez vos identifiants Bright Data au nœud Bright Data.
3.  **Configurer les Notifications :** Configurez votre méthode de notification préférée.
4.  **Personnaliser :** Définissez vos seuils de prix, la fréquence de surveillance et les échanges à suivre.

## Cas d'Utilisation

*   **Traders Crypto :** Recevez des notifications d'opportunités d'achat lors des baisses de prix.
*   **Investisseurs :** Surveillez vos investissements en crypto et prenez des décisions éclairées.
*   **Analystes Financiers :** Suivez les mouvements de prix du Bitcoin pour l'analyse de marché.

---

## Connectez-vous avec Moi

*   **Site Web :** [https://www.nofluff.online](https://www.nofluff.online)
*   **YouTube :** [https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)
*   **LinkedIn :** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)
*   **Obtenez Bright Data :** [https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25](https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25) (Utiliser ce lien soutient mes flux de travail gratuits avec une petite commission)

parameters.subject: =Bitcoin Price has dropped {{ $json.dropPercent }}%

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# 📉💰 **Bitcoin Price Drop Alert Workflow**

This automated workflow checks the current Bitcoin price and **sends an email alert if it drops by 5% or more** compared to the last recorded value. It’s split into 3 easy-to-understand sections:

---

## 🔎 **Section 1: Fetch the Current Bitcoin Price**

🧩 **Nodes:**

1. **⚡ Manual Trigger**
2. **🌐 Fetch Bitcoin Price**
3. **🧱 Extract Price**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **⚡ Manual Trigger**
  This starts the process manually. Think of it like pressing a "Start" button.

* **🌐 Fetch Bitcoin Price**
  Uses the [Bright Data API](https://brightdata.com/) to scrape the live Bitcoin price from a specific website using a POST request.

* **🧱 Extract Price**
  Extracts the **exact price value** from the scraped HTML using selectors (like CSS paths).

### 💡 Why It’s Useful:

You can track the **real-time price** of Bitcoin straight from any public site, even those not offering official APIs. It's like building your own live feed.

---

## 📊 **Section 2: Calculate and Compare with Historical Price**

🧩 **Nodes:**
4\. **🔄 Convert Type**
5\. **📗 Get Last Recorded Price (Google Sheet)**
6\. **📉 Find Drop Percentage**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **🔄 Convert Type**
  Converts the price from a text format to a number so we can calculate with it.

* **📗 Get Last Recorded Price**
  Pulls the **previous Bitcoin price** from a Google Sheet (a record from last check). Acts like your “memory”.

* **📉 Find Drop Percentage**
  Calculates how much the price has dropped:

  $$
  \text{Drop (\%)} = \frac{\text{Previous Price - Current Price}}{\text{Previous Price}} \times 100
  $$

### 💡 Why It’s Useful:

You’re comparing real-time data with past values automatically—no spreadsheets or calculators needed! This makes it ideal for **traders or enthusiasts** watching for price alerts.

---

## 🚨 **Section 3: Send Alert if Drop ≥ 5%**

🧩 **Nodes:**
7\. **🔀 If droppercentage >= 5**
8\. **📧 Send Alert Email**
9\. **➡️ No Alert Needed**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **🔀 If Statement**
  Checks: Has the price dropped by **5% or more**?

* **📧 Send Alert Email** (if true)
  Automatically sends an email to notify you about the drop. This could go to your inbox, or a team.

* **➡️ No Alert Needed** (if false)
  The workflow ends quietly without doing anything else.

### 💡 Why It’s Useful:

It **only alerts you when it matters**, saving your attention for big changes. You don’t need to monitor prices all day.

---

## 🎁 **Final Benefits:**

✅ **No coding required**
✅ **Real-time price check**
✅ **Smart alerts based on thresholds**
✅ **Great for traders, analysts, or crypto fans**
✅ **Fully extendable** – you could log alerts, update the sheet, send Slack/Telegram messages, etc.

---

## 🌈 BONUS IDEA:

Want it to run automatically? Add a **🕒 Cron Trigger** to check every 10 mins, 1 hour, or even daily!

---

## 🔎 **Section 1: Fetch the Current Bitcoin Price**

🧩 **Nodes:**

1. **⚡ Manual Trigger**
2. **🌐 Fetch Bitcoin Price**
3. **🧱 Extract Price**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **⚡ Manual Trigger**
  This starts the process manually. Think of it like pressing a "Start" button.

* **🌐 Fetch Bitcoin Price**
  Uses the [Bright Data API](https://brightdata.com/) to scrape the live Bitcoin price from a specific website using a POST request.

### 💡 Why It’s Useful:

---

## 📊 **Section 2: Calculate and Compare with Historical Price**

🧩 **Nodes:**
4\. **🔄 Convert Type**
5\. **📗 Get Last Recorded Price (Google Sheet)**
6\. **📉 Find Drop Percentage**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **🔄 Convert Type**
  Converts the price from a text format to a number so we can calculate with it.

* **📗 Get Last Recorded Price**

---

## 🚨 **Section 3: Send Alert if Drop ≥ 5%**

🧩 **Nodes:**

8\. **📧 Send Alert Email**
9\. **➡️ No Alert Needed**

### 🧠 What Happens:

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
